content: Hey! I'm really struggling with these morning meetings, they just kill my flow.
I prefer working late at night when everything is quiet.
Can you recommend something? I'm vegetarian btw.
I live in Berlin and the weather has been crazy lately.
My cat Luna keeps jumping on my keyboard during calls lol.
I'm allergic to peanuts, so always have to be careful.
Love listening to lo-fi beats while coding.
I hate long messages, please keep it brief.
Using Linux for everything, Windows just doesn't cut it for me.
Green tea is my go-to drink, have like 5 cups a day.
Async communication is so much better than constant interruptions.
I really appreciate when people respect my boundaries.
My friend Max is visiting from London next week.
The deadline is on March 15th, getting a bit stressed about it.
I tend to overthink things when I'm anxious.
Working from home has been great for my productivity.
I'm not a morning person at all, need at least two coffees to function.
Been feeling overwhelmed with all these projects lately.
I prefer short standup meetings, like 5 minutes max.
My dog needs walking around 7 PM every day.
I'm trying to learn Spanish but it's tough.
Paris is my favorite city, been there three times.
I get really frustrated when people don't read documentation.
My birthday is coming up on August 12th.
I'm allergic to shellfish too, found out the hard way.
I like direct communication, no need to sugarcoat things.
Been using Vim for 5 years now, can't go back to other editors.
I feel more creative at night, that's when ideas flow.
My sister Sarah is a doctor in New York.
I prefer text over calls, gives me time to think.
